input.sentences: fund raising event to support helpless animals .

output.sentences: He was helpless and needed support in raising money.
So, his coworkers held fundraisers and an event where everyone dressed up.
A band performed songs in front of the crowx.
The man playing the drums was very skilled.
The guitarist did a good job at making sure everyone was entertained.
